20.Description: Casts the skill and fires 1 Ice Lance forward.

BuffEffects.FiresProjectile: Fires 1 Projectile in its base state
BuffEffects.ConvertPhysicalToCold: Converts 100% of the skill's Physical Damage to Cold Damage
BuffEffects.InflictFrostbite: Inflicts Frostbite and 100 Frostbite Rating on hit
